sentence.Network_en: She stood glued to the radio, heedless of the ordered bustle about her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她站在那里一动不动地听收音机, 毫不注意周围有秩序的忙碌.

sentence.Network_en: She was rum-maging through the letters, scattering them about the table in her heedless haste.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在信件里乱翻，匆忙冒失之下将它们扔得满桌都是。

sentence.Network_en: Heedless of time or any other consideration, they began to search the underwater cave.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们顾不上考虑时间或任何其他因素就开始寻找水下洞穴。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... heartless 残忍的 heedless 不注意的 heirless 无继承人的.
onslaught 　 冲击heedless 　不注意的；不顾laissez faire 　 放任；自由主义
heed 注意heedless 不小心的heel 脚跟

list.abs: harsh answer苛刻的答案heedless answer漫不经心的回答immediate answer立即答复
heedless 分心心散忽视heedless of 分心heedlessly heel 踵蹭鞋跟脚跟脚踵脚蹭后跟鞋蹭紧跟尾随紧追追赶.
Don ' t stumble , you heedless little thing ., 别绊倒 , 你这个粗心的小东西.
without intention ; especially resulting from heedless action ., 没有目的的 ; 尤指源于无意识的行为.

entry.tran: 不注意的;不留心的;掉以轻心的
entry.def: If you are heedless of someone or something, you do not take any notice of them.

example.ex: Heedless of time or any other consideration, they began to search the underwater cave...
example.tran: 他们顾不上考虑时间或任何其他因素就开始寻找水下洞穴。

example.ex: She was rummaging through the letters, scattering them about the table in her heedless haste.
example.tran: 她在信件里乱翻，匆忙冒失之下将它们扔得满桌都是。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by or paying little heed or attention;

sentences.sentence: "We have always known that heedless self-interest was bad morals; we know now that it is bad economics"--Franklin D. Roosevelt
"the heedless generosity and the spasmodic extravagance of persons used to large fortunes"- Edith Wharton

auth_sentence.content: Heedless of the forebodings of many prophets of evil weather.
auth_sentence.res_content: Heedless of the forebodings of many prophets of evil weather.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Heedless of the forebodings of many prophets of evil weather.

auth_sentence.content: Like a runaway vehicle, he plunged on, heedless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like a runaway vehicle, he plunged on, heedless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like a runaway vehicle, he plunged on, heedless.

auth_sentence.content: Our children will have a hard time forgiving us our heedless flight from reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our children will have a hard time forgiving us our heedless flight from reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our children will have a hard time forgiving us our heedless flight from reality.
